summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for the period from November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013. It includes information about deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and transfers, indicating significant outgoing transfers to other banks.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as the contact person for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Outgoing Transfers
events.description: Two significant outgoing transfers of $120,000 and $100,000 were made to First Bank, Puerto Rico.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $572,921.98 on November 1, 2013.
A total of $200,000 was deposited into the account during the statement period.
Service charges included $50 for NSF return item fees and $5,000 for overdraft fees.
The ending balance as of November 30, 2013, was $52,921.98 after accounting for significant outgoing transfers.
Amanda Kirby is the contact person for inquiries related to the account.
